sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Load SLA Report Ranges from the com.snc.sla plugin only if the instance does not have custom sys_report_range records already defined for the task_sla table's actual time left field, if OOTB report range exists then override it</description>
        <name>SLA Report Ranges v2</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var ootbRange = "d13b4615b7610110c5aebc16de11a94a,cc2784e7738130102eb52d2b04f6a73d,d878cce7738130102eb52d2b04f6a7e0,1e5b4c6b738130102eb52d2b04f6a71a,326b8c6b738130102eb52d2b04f6a708,1f1dcc6b738130102eb52d2b04f6a702";
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_report_range");
    gr.addQuery("name", "task_sla");
    gr.addQuery("element", "time_left");
    gr.addQuery("sys_id", "NOT IN", ootbRange);
    gr.setLimit(1);
    gr.query();
    if (!gr.hasNext()) {
        gs.log("Loading sys_report_ranges for task_sla.time_left", "[com.snc.sla][Fix Script: Load SLA Report Ranges]");
        GlideUpdateManager2().load("com.snc.sla", "update.report_ranges");
    }

})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-05 13:10:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d8b5490c43793110b8cf8beeaab8f27a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SLA Report Ranges v2</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service level management" source="com.snc.sla">e2d7bc6c3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f1f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d8b5490c43793110b8cf8beeaab8f27a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-05 16:20:38</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
